column1: From what we have heard it is open and also open to day passes. Anyone whom has Facebook check out todohyatulco page.
That's really unfortunate as the state continues to be RED, and the national daily new COVID-19 infections spike.
It looks wonderful! When I saw it in January I didn’t expect that it would be open this soon. Can’t wait to see it in person, it is a great addition to the hotel.
Looks lovely, hopefully we will be able to check it out in person in December!
